mapper.sql: id, title, status, manager_id, create_time, update_time, content
mapper.select: select from t_note where id > #{lastId} order by create_time desc limit #{rows}
mapper.insert: insert into t_note (title, content, status, manager_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: update t_note set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
